**Readcount only settings**

[CPM](https://idepsite.wordpress.com/pre-process#CountsData): `r input$numMinCounts`

[n libraries](https://idepsite.wordpress.com/pre-process#CountsData): `r input$numNMinSamplesInCountCase`

[Transform algorithm](https://idepsite.wordpress.com/pre-process#CountsData_transformation): `r switch(as.numeric(input$selectCountsTransform), 'EdgeR', 'VST', 'rlog')`
